author: James.M
content: Hi Andreas. So you did get the ND filter in the end? I wonder why camera makers don't make built-in ND filters more often these days. Always having a split filter in particular would be really useful, and I can't imagine it would be that hard to implement. (Btw, I just ordered an LX-5 to replace my ancient, all-auto point-and-shoot, and I'm really looking forward to getting out and shooting with it.)
